name: Edge of Yesterday
description:
Edge of Yesterday

My final IA project. Special thanks to Marlon and Nicole for their helpful criticisms and feedback.

Split into two parts due to Construct 2's free trial capping the amount of events per game project.

I've had lots of fun making this, so I hope you have fun playing it as well!

Cheers

Credit to:

Redshrike for Zett's sprite (originally named Xeon)

http://opengameart.org/forumtopic/xeon-as-he-is-sp...

Square Enix, Bioware and Satoru Kōsaki for the original music files (Ruined World, Feros and Zutsuu)

Freesfx.co.uk for sound effects
